article: Someone says, "Time is money." But I think time is  much more  important than money. Why? Because when money is spent, we can get it back. However, when time is  _  ,it will never  _  . This is  _  we must not waste time. We think that  _  is usually limited . Even a second is very important. We should make full use of our time to do  something  useful. But it is a pity that there are a lot of people who do not know the importance of time. They spent their limited time smoking, drinking and  _  . They do not know that wasting time means wasting part of their own  _  . In a word, we should save time... We should not  _  today's work for tomorrow. Remember we have no time to  _  .
